com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies
Class ALVideoRecorder

java.lang.Object
  com.aldebaran.qi.helper.ALProxy
      com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies.ALVideoRecorder

public class ALVideoRecorder
extends ALProxy

This module provides methods to record videos and store them on disk.

See Also:
NAOqi APIs for ALVideoRecorder

wait

public java.lang.Boolean wait(java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer timeoutPeriod)
                       throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'

Parameters:
id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
timeoutPeriod - The timeout period in ms. To wait indefinately, use a timeoutPeriod of zero.
Returns:
True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

startRecording

public void startRecording(java.lang.String folderPath,
                           java.lang.String fileName)
                    throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
Starts recording a video. Please note that only one record at a time can be made.

Parameters:
folderPath - Folder where the video is saved.
fileName - Filename used to save the video.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

startRecording

public void startRecording(java.lang.String folderPath,
                           java.lang.String fileName,
                           java.lang.Boolean overwrite)
                    throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
Starts recording a video. Please note that only one record at a time can be made.

Parameters:
folderPath - Folder where the video is saved.
fileName - Filename used to save the video.
overwrite - If false and the filename already exists, an exception is thrown.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

stopRecording

public java.lang.Object stopRecording()
                               throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                                      java.lang.InterruptedException
Stops a video record that was launched with startRecording(). The function returns the number of frames that were recorded, as well as the video absolute file name.

Returns:
Array of two elements [numRecordedFrames, recordAbsolutePath]
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException
